text:
Cerebral venous thrombosis: a retrospective cohort study of 513,284 confirmed #COVID19 cases and a comparison with 489,871 people receiving #COVID19 #mRNA #vaccine
CVT risk after COVID-19 is ~8-10-fold than reported for vaccines, ~100-fold than population
https://t.co/2LY98h4L5J https://t.co/kF4x2XH7F4
